long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save time and avoid repetitive typing with BasiText! This browser extension offers an efficient way to manage and insert text templates. With features like:

1. Assign codes to your templates and save them in your browser for fast and easy insertion.
2. Quickly insert templates with a double tap of the CTRL key and an autosuggestion window.
3. Manage all templates directly in your browser - no need to register for an account.
4. Search and copy templates with just one click.
5. Use the focus mode window for efficient use, which can be resized to accompany the primary window.
6. Key in common emojis and dates quickly with our text expander feature.

BasiText supports most web forms with standard text inputs. Enjoy a more productive browsing experience - install BasiText now!
